section.title: build, test, run

formalpara.title: build, run and test using gradle / docker

para.programlisting:
./gradlew java -jar build/libs/*.jar bash build/libs/*.jar

formalpara.title: build, run and test using maven / docker

para.programlisting:
./mvnw java -jar target/*.jar bash target/*.jar
bash mvnw docker-compose:up -P docker bash mvnw docker-compose:down -P docker
